item.title: Eating pure DNA
item.description: In this video I show you how to extract DNA! Then I eat it just to see what it tastes like! I take the DNA out of strawberries, kiwis and even shrimp! This is an amazing experiment that you could do in your own home with simple ingredients. I talk about why the reaction happens and then finally eat all of the DNA at the end!
